name: Stone Fence
description: Let's get this weekend started right. Here's a cocktail from Paul Clarke to kick things off. Need more than one? That kinda week, eh? Here you go. Cheers! It may sound like a powder keg, but this drink that predates...
recipeIngredient: one ounce dark rum or whiskey of your choice

recipeInstructions.text: In a 12 to 16-ounce glass, pour one ounce of applejack, apple brandy, dark rum or whiskey of your choice. Fill with hard cider; add a couple of ice cubes, if desired.
